an5.78:1.1: “Pancimani, bhikkhave, anagatabhayani sampassamanena alameva bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.78:1.4: ‘aham kho etarahi daharo yuva susukalakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannagato pathamena vayasa.
an5.78:1.5: Hoti kho pana so samayo yam imam kayam jara phusati.
an5.78:1.6: Jinnena kho pana jaraya abhibhutena na sukaram buddhanam sasanam manasi katum, na sukarani arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevitum.
an5.78:1.7: Pura mam so dhammo agacchati anittho akanto amanapo;
an5.78:1.8: handaham patikacceva viriyam arabhami appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya, yenaham dhammena samannagato jinnakopi phasum viharissami’ti.
an5.78:1.9: Idam, bhikkhave, pathamam anagatabhayam sampassamanena alameva bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.78:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
an5.78:2.2: ‘aham kho etarahi appabadho appatanko samavepakiniya gahaniya samannagato natisitaya naccunhaya majjhimaya padhanakkhamaya.
an5.78:2.3: Hoti kho pana so samayo yam imam kayam byadhi phusati.
an5.78:2.4: Byadhitena kho pana byadhina abhibhutena na sukaram buddhanam sasanam manasi katum, na sukarani arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevitum.
an5.78:2.5: Pura mam so dhammo agacchati anittho akanto amanapo;
an5.78:2.6: handaham patikacceva viriyam arabhami appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya, yenaham dhammena samannagato byadhitopi phasum viharissami’ti.
an5.78:2.7: Idam, bhikkhave, dutiyam anagatabhayam sampassamanena alameva bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.78:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
an5.78:3.2: ‘etarahi kho subhikkham susassam sulabhapindam, sukaram unchena paggahena yapetum.
an5.78:3.3: Hoti kho pana so samayo yam dubbhikkham hoti dussassam dullabhapindam, na sukaram unchena paggahena yapetum.
an5.78:3.4: Dubbhikkhe kho pana manussa yena subhikkham tena sankamanti.
an5.78:3.6: Sanganikavihare kho pana sati akinnavihare na sukaram buddhanam sasanam manasi katum, na sukarani arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevitum.
an5.78:3.7: Pura mam so dhammo agacchati anittho akanto amanapo;
an5.78:3.8: handaham patikacceva viriyam arabhami appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya, yenaham dhammena samannagato dubbhikkhepi phasu viharissami’ti.
an5.78:3.9: Idam, bhikkhave, tatiyam anagatabhayam sampassamanena alameva bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.78:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
an5.78:4.2: ‘etarahi kho manussa samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharanti.
an5.78:4.3: Hoti kho pana so samayo yam bhayam hoti atavisankopo, cakkasamarulha janapada pariyayanti.
an5.78:4.4: Bhaye kho pana sati manussa yena khemam tena sankamanti.
an5.78:4.6: Sanganikavihare kho pana sati akinnavihare na sukaram buddhanam sasanam manasi katum, na sukarani arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevitum.
an5.78:4.7: Pura mam so dhammo agacchati anittho akanto amanapo;
an5.78:4.8: handaham patikacceva viriyam arabhami appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya, yenaham dhammena samannagato bhayepi phasum viharissami’ti.
an5.78:4.9: Idam, bhikkhave, catuttham anagatabhayam sampassamanena alameva bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.78:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
an5.78:5.2: ‘etarahi kho sangho samaggo sammodamano avivadamano ekuddeso phasu viharati.
an5.78:5.3: Hoti kho pana so samayo yam sangho bhijjati.
an5.78:5.4: Sanghe kho pana bhinne na sukaram buddhanam sasanam manasi katum, na sukarani arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani patisevitum.
an5.78:5.5: Pura mam so dhammo agacchati anittho akanto amanapo;
an5.78:5.6: handaham patikacceva viriyam arabhami appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya, yenaham dhammena samannagato bhinnepi sanghe phasum viharissami’ti.
an5.78:5.7: Idam, bhikkhave, pancamam anagatabhayam sampassamanena alameva bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.78:6.1: Imani kho, bhikkhave, panca anagatabhayani sampassamanena alameva bhikkhuna appamattena atapina pahitattena viharitum appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya”ti.
